means: （即将出版的书等的）内容介绍，简介

sentence.Network_en: An order form was included with the prospectus.
I'm sure you've got a whole prospectus on the subject, right?
sentence.Network_cn: 我相信关于这个主题你有一整本说明书, 对 吗 ?

sentence.Network_en: Yes, I did read about it in the prospectus you sent me about the section.
sentence.Network_cn: 对了, 在你们寄给我的质检科规划书中我读到过.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from Latin, literally view, prospect', from the verb prospicere, from pro- 'forward' + specere 'to look'

entry.tran: （学校、公司等的）章程，简章，说明书
entry.def: A prospectus is a detailed document produced by a college, school, or company, which gives details about it.

means.word_mean: 1. a formal written offer to sell securities (filed with the SEC) that sets forth a plan for a (proposed) business enterprise;

sentences.sentence: "a prospectus should contain the facts that an investor needs to make an informed decision"

means.word_mean: 2. a catalog listing the courses offered by a college or university

auth_sentence.content: Study the prospectus or talk to a financial adviser.
auth_sentence.res_content: Study the prospectus or talk to a financial adviser.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Study the prospectus or talk to a financial adviser.

auth_sentence.content: Those results and the projections in their prospectus are unaudited.
auth_sentence.res_content: Those results and the projections in their prospectus are unaudited.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Those results and the projections in their prospectus are unaudited.

auth_sentence.content: Please read the prospectus carefully before investing.
auth_sentence.res_content: Please read the prospectus carefully before investing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Please read the prospectus carefully before investing.

stems_affixes.word_buile: circum周围+spect看→看周围→小心
per全部+spect看+ive……的→看透了的→透视的
prospect前景+ive……的→adj.预期的
respect尊敬+able可以……的→adj.可敬的;人格高尚的
respect尊敬,尊重+ful有……的→adj.恭敬的,尊重的
re回+spect看+ive……的→回头看[自己]→各自的
retrospect[v.回顾,回想]+ive……的→adj.追想的,回顾的
spect看+acular……的→adj.壮观的,引人注目的 n.壮观的演出
respective[adj.各自的,各个的]+ly表副词→adv.分别地, 各个地
pro前面+spect看→向前看→前景

stems_affixes.value_cn: 样子, 外表, 面貌, [问题等的]方面
stems_affixes.word_buile: a加强意义+spect看→看的东西→外表,容貌
circumspect[adj.小心谨慎的]+ion表名词→n.细心,慎重
inspect[v.检查,调查,视察]+or人→n.检查员, 巡视员
inspect[v.检查,调查,视察]+ion表名词→n.检查,审查;检阅

stems_affixes.value_cn: 章程,内容简介;创办计划
stems_affixes.word_buile: pro前+spect看+us→向前看的东西
re再+spect看→再看[一眼]→尊敬
spect看+acle东西→看的东西→景象;眼镜
spect看+acular……的→adj.壮观的,引人注目的 n.壮观的演出
spect看+ator人→看的人
spect看+rum→可以看的范围
re再+spect看→再看[一眼]→尊敬
ex出+pect=spect看→看出去,看外面→期待
in内,里面+spect看→看里面→检查
retro向后+spect看→向后看
spec=spect看+ulate→看准了→思考,投机
sus下面+spect看→在下面看一看,斜眼看→怀疑
